name: Lotia®
description: Dreamer Reef O’Meara and his crew on the Surprise journey across Lotia, trying to avoid entanglements with the dreaded Dominion who rule the seas.  The nature of their latest enterprise embroils them in a desperate conflict, one whose outcome will determine the fate of all who dwell in Lotia.
minimum_requirements: OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better. Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU. Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: 1280x720 or better Display.
